pages.text: So much electricity on such a small ship...
Cybele is a small support ship carrying two large tesla coils, allowing its shots to damage shielded ships.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/energy_overloader)$(l)Charged Shell/$$(br)Cybele's tesla coils electrify the front gun, firing a highly energized shell. Upon contacting an $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/energy_shield)energy shield/$, all the stored energy is unleashed, $(l)obliterating the shield/$. This ability has $(l)3 Uses/$ and costs $(l)2 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/counterfire)$(l)Energy Outlash/$$(br)$(l)Upon being damaged/$, one of the tesla coils is destroyed. This causes the stored energy to violently lash out, $(l)damaging 2 random opponent tiles/$.
pages.title: Passive Ability
